DbHelper: Make method to get instance synchronized
The DbHelper classes should be a singleton, but then the
method to get the singleton instance should be synchronized, in
case several threads are trying to get hold of an instance.

done some initial tests.

DataManager: Refactor by making a new private method
Make new private method, and use it from three places, to avoid code
duplication.
Make some public static methods private static, since they
are only used internally in the class.
Code cleanup: use public static, not static public

Merge pull request #71 from alfh/fix_code_review_changes

Code review changes

AutoUpdateInfo: fix equals method to use String equals

This change has not been tested, but the implementation of
the equals method for AutoUpdateInfo seems wrong, also when
one look at the hashCode method.

So instead of using == for comparing strings, use the String.equals
method.

I am guessing that the current implementation of the equals may be
causing duplicate files to be uploaded, ref problems in pull request
number 43, but this is highly speculative from my side.

I've changed the implementation of the equals method to be like
the other overriden equals methods in the project.

If my changes are wrong, the equals method in AutoUpdateInfo should
receive some comments as to why the use of == is correct

Merge pull request #72 from alfh/fix_autoupdateinfo_equals

AutoUpdateInfo: fix equals method to use String equals

SeafConnection: Consistent handling of http reponse status handling

Add private method, used in all http get and post calls, to check
the reponse status, and log if request failed.
The method also logs to verbose if the request was successful, this
can be useful if one wants to see the http traffic going to the server.

http status codes than 200 as success.

Merge pull request #81 from alfh/fix_code_review_changes

DBHelpers: make code consistent, only open database once
organize all changes
fix a small bug, change android-19 to android-17

DataManager: return empty list when account has no repos
When an account has not repos, the user should get info about it
in the GUI.
Currently, the DataManager returns null in that case, and then the
GUI display message about error fetching repos.
So change the DataManager to return empty list of repos in this case,
and then the GUI displays message that there are no libraries yet.

BrowserActivity: handle case where no path is returned for file to upload

When the user chooses the 'Other' upload method, and then selects an image,
the path will be null, and it will cause a nullpointer in BrowserActivity.
Rudimentary avoid this NPE by showing a message to the user, and log it.

SeafileObserver: Remove files from watched and recent lists

After a file is no longer recent, it should be removed from the recent downloaded list,
to avoid that list growing forever larger.
When a file has been removed from the device, it should no longer be in the list of
watched files, to avoid that list growing forever larger.
made some small changes and thanks to Alf Høgemark's advice
